result.TITLE: Bitrix24 Implementation Request
result.COMMENTS:
I am reaching out on behalf of PIPECARE to discuss the possibility of implementing a CRM system to enhance our sales process. We would like to request pricing information for your solution.



PIPECARE Group provides intelligent In-line Inspection Services to pipeline operators in the oil and gas industry. With approximately 50 individuals involved in our sales process, we are focused on increasing our sales numbers and improving efficiency. Our goal is to implement a CRM system that can effectively support our team and streamline our sales activities. Details of the request can be found in the attached file.



To evaluate the suitability of your CRM solution for our organization, we kindly request the following pricing estimation and details:



Licensing Fees: Please provide information on the pricing structure for user licenses. As we have around 50 individuals involved in the sales process, we need to ensure that the licensing fees are suitable for our team size.



Implementation Costs: We would like to understand the costs involved in setting up and configuring the CRM system to meet our specific needs, including data migration, customization, and integration with our existing systems. 



Maintenance and Support: Please outline the ongoing maintenance and support fees, along with details of available service-level agreements, technical assistance, and software updates.



Training and Adoption: We are interested in any training programs offered to help our staff effectively utilize the CRM system. Please provide information on the availability, cost, and duration of these programs.



In addition, Legal department requests the next info:

-	software registration documentation, 

-	corporate establishment documentation to the company-owner of the software, who will be the party of the purchase contact.



Thank you for your attention to this matter. We look forward to your prompt response.

result.TITLE: Bitrix24 Implementation Request
result.COMMENTS:
I hope this message finds you well. My name is Saeed Al Falasi, the CEO of Big Story, a startup agency specializing in product photography. We're presently in the process of establishing our operations, and as such, we're exploring high-performing studio management systems that can seamlessly manage our sophisticated and high-volume workflows.



To provide a bit of context, our agency manages approximately 1200 product photos daily. Given this significant volume, we're on the lookout for a robust and efficient system that could streamline our operations, which essentially include client product reception, actual product shooting, photo transmission to our editing team, and final delivery to the client.



We're particularly interested in your and I am writing to you to understand if your platform can cater to our specific needs. Some critical elements for us include:



1. High-volume capacity to manage up to 1200 product photos per day.

2. Efficient workflow management for tasks such as receiving products from clients, shooting the products, sending photos to editors, and delivering the final images to clients.

3. Simplified, user-friendly interface for ease of use.

4. Detailed tracking features to monitor the progress of each product's lifecycle.



If you believe your solutions could meet these needs, we would greatly appreciate it if you could share:



1. A detailed overview of your system's capabilities and features, particularly those that would be beneficial to our specific workflow.

2. Case studies or examples of similar organizations that have successfully used your system.

3. Next steps towards a demo or trial of your system.



Our goal is to set up an efficient, seamless workflow that would allow us to focus on delivering high-quality product photos for our clients, and we believe that the right studio management system is a critical element of achieving this goal.



Thank you for taking the time to read our request. We look forward to hearing from you at your earliest convenience.



Best regards,



Saeed Al Falasi

CEO, Big Story

+971568066677

[url=https://www.bigstory.agency]https://www.bigstory.agency[/url]

result.TITLE: Bitrix24 Implementation Request
result.COMMENTS:
Hello, 



Hope you’re doing well, I’m contacting you considering that I don’t find your sales contact. Im the project manager of the city of Gatineau’s citizen portal project. 

We have some questions about your CRM and we’re wondering how it can fit our needs. 



Here are some of the questions that we would like your response to :	



1.	Hosting: Do you offer a physical data center in Canada? If not, where? And with which providers?

2.	Municipal service-oriented offer: Do you have features oriented for municipal services? If not, how can your application adapt to our current (see attached list) and future needs? Can you name a few city case studies?

3.	Flexibility and autonomy of configuration/development internally: To what extent does your application allow us internal autonomy for a simplified/assisted configuration of new online services/features?

4.	Native French: Does your solution offer a native French solution? If not, how easy is it to adjust the terminologies used to adapt to our context?

5.	Citizen login billing: Do you bill for the number of external connections to the portal/CRM by citizens?

6.	Internal user billing: Do you bill for the number of internal users in read-only mode/access to reporting? If yes, how much per user/month?

7.	License Costs: On what factors do your license costs based? How much do you charge per user per month knowing that we have 40 users and we plan a contract of 3 to 5 years minimum after implementation?

8.	Multi-channel integration:

1.	How does your CRM handle data fr om different channels and systems? Is it capable of synchronizing and consolidating this data into a unique citizen profile, providing a 360-degree view of the citizen? Any examples of implementing this 360 view?

2.	What is your approach to integrating new channels or systems in the future? What level of customization and flexibility does your CRM offer to adapt to the changing needs of our organization?

3.	What types of resources or skills will be needed on our part to facilitate this integration knowing that we have about ten systems and around 103 requests to cover for the 360 view?

9.	API call lim it:

1.	What happens when the API call limit is reached?

2.	What is the limit of calls to your APIs per day/hour?

10.	Customization:

1.	To what extent is your CRM customizable? Can you give examples of features or elements that we could adapt to our specific needs?

2.	What is the level of technical skill needed to customize your CRM? Does it require coding skills or do you offer an intuitive user interface for customization?

11.	Process Automation:

1.	What types of processes can your CRM automate? Can you give examples of recurring tasks that your system can automatically handle?

2.	How can we configure or customize automation rules in your CRM? Is this a process that we can manage ourselves, or do we need to use your services to do it?

12.	Data Analysis:

1.	What data analysis tools are integrated into your CRM? How can these tools help us understand the trends and behavior patterns of our citizens?

2.	Is it possible to integrate your CRM with external data analysis tools if necessary?

13.	Internal Collaboration:

1.	How does your CRM facilitate collaboration among internal teams? Are there specific features designed to support collaboration and information sharing?

2.	How are access permissions to information managed to ensure confidentiality while promoting collaboration?

14.	KPI Tracking:

1.	What types of standard KPIs can be tracked with your CRM? Can KPIs be customized according to our specific needs?

2.	How does your CRM present KPIs to facilitate their tracking and analysis?

15.	Scalability:

1.	How can your CRM evolve to support the growth of our city?

2.	What is the process for adding additional users, integrations, or features to your CRM as our needs evolve?

16.	Internal Chatbot:

1.	Does your CRM support the integration of an internal chatbot? If yes, with what tool?

2.	What programming languages and technologies does your chatbot support?

17.	Dynamic Central Request Form:

1.	Does your CRM allow for the creation of dynamic forms to centralize citizen requests?

2.	How can these forms be customized to our specific needs and internal processes?

18.	Languages/technologies used:

1.	What programming languages and technologies are used behind your CRM?

2.	How do these technologies affect the scalability of your CRM?

19.	Example of AI applications:

1.	What features of your CRM are enhanced by AI?

2.	Can you give concrete examples of how these features work and the value they can bring to interactions with citizens?



Do not hesitate to write to me if you need clarification.



Thanks in advance and looking forward to hear from you!





Youness Mouhib

Coordonnateur de projets TI

Technologies de l'information - Administration

Ville de Gatineau

Édifice d'Europe, 2e étage

C. P. 1970, succ. Hull

Gatineau (Québec) J8X 3Y9

Téléphone : 819 243-2345, poste 5607

Télécopieur : 819 685-5037

result.TITLE: Bitrix24 Implementation Request
result.COMMENTS:
Brief. 



We are into skin healthcare field. We have 2 brands for which we do marketing activities through social media, google and other digital channels.



Customer shows interest and connect to us via chat, comment, call, whatsapp, email, google message, etc.



The interest is handled by a team at the first level and updated or reassigned to other teams depending on some logic.



The other team then works on the leads till it is converted or dead. During this time, the team engages with the lead via chat, whatsapp, phone, messages, etc.



If the lead is converted, it is passed on to the department that takes care of customers during their lifecycle with us. This team uses chat, phone, API trigerred messages to communicate with the customers.



Currently, we are using different systems to ensure the communication is smooth but with scale, we are looking for a single system that takes care of everything.



Is Bitrix24 the one? Thats what we want to explore

result.TITLE: Bitrix24 Implementation Request
result.COMMENTS:
Dear Bitrix24 Team.

We are from Victoria Clipper and operate ferry services between Victoria, BC to Seattle, US. We also have Tours and Travel services. We are looking for cloud call-center service providers for our customer care call center. Some of the must-have requirements are.

•	25+ call queue capability.

•	125+ user

•	Call recording services according to PCI regulations

•	Call forwarding facility.

•	Seamless integration with TravelBox software.

•	Seamless integration with Microsoft Azure

•	Seamless integration with Happy Fox.

We would love to hear more from your product. Have a fantastic day ahead.

 

Regards

 

 

Pronob Das

FRS Clipper, Management Trainee 

Clipper Navigation, LTD.

254 Belleville St, Victoria BC V8V 1W9

ClipperVacations.com
